keyMoments.title: Demaro Black Impersonates Luffy
keyMoments.description: Demaro Black is revealed as the imposter posing as Monkey D. Luffy, leading the Fake Straw Hat Crew on Sabaody Archipelago.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the main antagonist of the fake crew subplot who demonstrates the extent of the real Straw Hats' fame.
keyMoments.quote: You bumped into me! Apologize now or face the consequences!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Real Luffy's Haki
keyMoments.description: Demaro Black shoots at the real Luffy but is instantly knocked unconscious by Luffy's Conqueror's Haki along with his entire crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the vast difference in power between the fake and real Luffy, and serves as the first showcase of Luffy's post-timeskip Haki mastery.

keyMoments.title: True Identity Exposed
keyMoments.description: PX-5 reveals Demaro Black's true identity and bounty of 26,000,000 berries, exposing him as 'Three-Tongued' Demaro Black.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how much weaker the imposter is compared to the real Luffy's 400,000,000 berry bounty.

reveals.information: Real name is Demaro Black, known as 'Three-Tongued'

keyMoments.title: Caribou Joins Fake Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Caribou, known as 'Wet Hair' Caribou, is revealed to have joined the Fake Straw Hat Crew along with his brother Coribou, though his true intention is to infiltrate and kill the real Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a major antagonist for the upcoming Fish-Man Island arc who has significantly higher bounty than most rookies.

relationships.description: Brothers and co-captains of the Caribou Pirates

evolutionMoments.description: Caribou and Coribou are revealed as brothers working together.

reveals.information: Joined Fake Straw Hats to kill the real Straw Hats from inside

keyMoments.title: Coribou Joins Fake Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Coribou, known as 'Blood-Splatterer' Coribou, is revealed to have joined the Fake Straw Hat Crew along with his brother Caribou to infiltrate and kill the real Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of another antagonist for the Fish-Man Island arc, showing the dangerous level of pirates attracted to the fake crew.

relationships.description: Brothers and co-captains of the Caribou Pirates

evolutionMoments.description: Caribou and Coribou are revealed as brothers working together.

reveals.information: Joined Fake Straw Hats to kill the real Straw Hats from inside

keyMoments.title: First Post-Timeskip Haki Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates both Kenbunshoku (Observation) Haki to dodge a bullet and Haoshoku (Conqueror's) Haki to knock out the entire Fake Straw Hat Crew and bystanders in a controlled manner.
keyMoments.significance: First showcase of Luffy's mastered Haki abilities after the two-year training with Rayleigh, proving his tremendous growth in power.
keyMoments.quote: I don't have time for fakes.

abilities.description: Luffy uses Observation Haki to sense and dodge a bullet fired at point-blank range.
Luffy releases a controlled burst of Conqueror's Haki, knocking out multiple weak-willed opponents simultaneously.

reveals.information: Can control and weaponize Haoshoku Haki (Conqueror's Haki)

keyMoments.title: Cuts Ship in Half
keyMoments.description: After mistakenly boarding a pirate ship heading underwater toward Fish-Man Island, Zoro effortlessly cuts the entire ship in half.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's increased strength after the two-year timeskip, showing he can now bisect an entire ship with ease.

reveals.information: Can effortlessly cut entire ships in half

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Encounters Fake Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Chopper mistakes Fake Sanji, Fake Zoro, and Fake Robin for his real crewmates but quickly realizes they are imposters due to their different personalities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's genuine bond with his crewmates and his ability to distinguish the real crew from fakes despite initial confusion.
keyMoments.quote: Sanji! Zoro! Robin! I found you!

keyMoments.title: Learns About Crew's Status
keyMoments.description: At Shakky's Rip-off Bar, Sanji learns that all the Straw Hats except Luffy and Robin have already arrived at Sabaody, and hears about Zoro's directional mistake.
keyMoments.significance: Provides exposition about the crew's reunion status and shows Sanji's concern for his crewmates.
keyMoments.quote: That green-haired fool got on the wrong ship again!
